Reference

All functions

pkg_appveyor()

Create a Boilerplate Package appveyor.yml File.

pkg_build()

Build Package.

pkg_create()

Create a Boilerplate R Package.

pkg_data()

Create a Boilerplate Package Data File.

pkg_description()

Create a Package DESCRIPTION File.

pkg_gitignore()

Create a Boilerplate Package .gitignore File.

pkg_license()

Create a Package License.

pkg_namespace()

Create a Boilerplate Package NAMESPACE.

pkg_pkgdown()

Create a Boilerplate Package _pkgdown.yml.

pkg_r()

Create a Boilerplate Package R Script.

pkg_rbuildignore()

Create a Boilerplate Package .Rbuildignore File.

pkg_rd()

Create a Boilerplate Package Rd Function Documentation.

pkg_readme()

Create a Boilerplate Package README File.

pkg_render()

Render R Markdown Files in the Package Directory.

pkg_rproj()

Create a Package .Rproj File.

pkg_test()

Create a Boilerplate Package Test File.

pkg_travis()

Create a Boilerplate Package .travis.yml File.

pkg_vignette()

Create a Boilerplate Package Vignette File.

util_lapply()

lapply Utility.

util_os()

Get Operating System.

util_render()

Render R Scripts and R Markdown Files.

util_style()

Style R and R Markdown Files.

util_txt2file()

Text to File.
